pullRequest.title: Create a common list of field names for the Graylog Schema.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
The Graylog Security team has created a common schema to use as the basis for future official content packs.  This change will make it easier for new and existing Inputs to re-use the fields defined for the Graylog Schema.
How Has This Been Tested?
Fields have been tested with the new Okta enterprise plugin.
Types of changes

 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:

 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

commit.message:
Create a common list of field names for the Graylog Schema.

The Graylog Security team has created a common schema to use as the basis for future official content packs.  This change will make it easier for new and existing Inputs to re-use the fields defined for the Graylog Schema.

nodes.bodyText: What do you think about moving this into the org.graylog.schema package? (doesn't exist yet) I think we will have more related code in there in the future and so it isn't buried in the inputs package. 😃
